welcome_news: üì¢ Follow us on @doublegram_news for the latest news
main_menu_description: Select one of the options below to manage the bot:
default_ai_prompt: Create a message for a Telegram post about this product, around 500 characters, highlight the discount if it's a big discount, and use compelling phrases related to the product. Don't include hashtags. Use Telegram HTML formatting: - text for bold (product names, important discounts, final prices) - text for italic (emphatic phrases) - text for strikethrough (original prices) The style should be like this: Product Name Text here with catchy phrases and product details. If the discount is significant (>20%), emphasize it with phrases like "Incredible discount!" or "Unmissable opportunity!" üí∞ Original price: XXX.XX‚Ç¨ üí∏ Final price: XXX.XX‚Ç¨ (-XX%) Add a final urgency phrase in italics if appropriate, like "Only for today!" or "Limited quantities!" DO NOT include links in the text - they will be added automatically via buttons.
spiacente_non_autorizzato: ‚ùå Sorry, you are not authorized to use this bot.
nessuna_categoria_disponibile: ‚ùå No categories available Before managing products, you need to create at least one category.
messaggio_gi√†_approvato: ‚úÖ This message has already been approved
non_ho_capito_il_messaggio: ü§î I didn't understand your message. Use /help to see available commands.
clicca_qui_sotto_per_aggiungere_una_nuov: Click below to add a new category:
clicca_qui_sotto_per_aggiungere_la_prima: Click below to add the first category:
il_nome_deve_essere_tra_2_e_50_caratteri: The name must be between 2 and 50 characters
la_descrizione_deve_essere_tra_5_e_200_c: The description must be between 5 and 200 characters
seleziona_una_categoria_per_vedere_i_pro: Select a category to view products or add a new product
usa_il_pulsante_qui_sotto_per_aggiungere: Use the button below to add the first product:
tutti_gli_sconti_associati_a_questo_prod: All discounts associated with this product will be deleted.
eliminati_anche_tutti_gli_sconti_associa: All associated discounts have also been deleted.
clicca_su_una_categoria_per_visualizzarn: Click on a category to view its details
aggiungi_la_prima_categoria_per_iniziare: Add the first category to get started!
seleziona_la_categoria_a_cui_vuoi_assegn: Select the category you want to assign a Telegram group link to:
prima_di_configurare_il_cronjob_devi_imp: Before configuring the cronjob you need to set up a database channel.
il_canale_database_√®_necessario_per_inv: The database channel is necessary to send discount notifications for approval.
vai_su_canale_database_per_configurarlo_: Go to Database Channel to configure it first.
usa_il_pulsante_qui_sotto_per_modificare: Use the button below to modify the configuration
il_bot_deve_essere_amministratore_nel_ca: The bot must be an administrator in the channel
il_canale_database_√®_dove_il_bot_invier: The database channel is where the bot will send messages for discount approval
usa_il_pulsante_qui_sotto_per_configurar: Use the button below to configure
usa_il_pulsante_qui_sotto_per_modificare: Use the button below to modify the tag
il_tag_di_affiliazione_amazon_verr√†_agg: The Amazon affiliate tag will be added to product links
usa_il_pulsante_qui_sotto_per_modificare: Use the button below to modify the prompt
prompt_attuale_mostrato_nel_messaggio_so: Current prompt shown in the message below
il_prompt_personalizzato_verr√†_usato_da: The custom prompt will be used by OpenAI to improve discount messages
il_tag_di_affiliazione_amazon_verr√†_agg: The Amazon affiliate tag will be automatically added to Amazon links
seleziona_la_categoria_per_questo_prodot: Select the category for this product
invia_il_nuovo_link_per_sostituire_quell: Send the new link to replace the existing one
invia_il_link_del_gruppo_telegram_per_qu: Send the Telegram group link for this category
si_√®_verificato_un_errore_durante_lasse: An error occurred during link assignment. Try again.
inserisci_ogni_quanti_minuti_deve_essere: Enter how many minutes between price checks:
lintervallo_minimo_√®_5_minuti_per_evita: The minimum interval is 5 minutes to avoid overload.
ora_inserisci_quanti_minuti_di_pausa_dev: Now enter how many minutes of pause should pass between analyzing one product and the next:
pausa_pi√π_lunga_=_meno_rischio_di_esser: Longer pause = less risk of being blocked by Amazon
la_pausa_minima_√®_1_minuto_per_evitare_: The minimum pause is 1 minute to avoid being blocked.
prima_configura_gli_intervalli_usando_il: First configure the intervals using the 'Configure Intervals' button.
invia_il_nuovo_id_del_canale_per_aggiorn: Send the new channel ID to update the configuration
il_bot_deve_essere_gi√†_amministratore_n: The bot must already be an administrator in the channel
aggiungi_userinfobot_al_canale_e_scrivi_: Add @userinfobot to the channel and write /id
l_id_del_canale_deve_essere_un_numero_ne: The channel ID must be a negative number starting with `-`.
riprova_con_l_id_corretto_o_invia: Try again with the correct ID or send /annulla to cancel.
il_bot_invier√†_ora_i_messaggi_di_approv: The bot will now send approval messages to this channel when it detects new discounts
invia_il_nuovo_prompt_per_aggiornare_la_: Send the new prompt to update the configuration
invia_il_prompt_personalizzato_che_opena: Send the custom prompt that OpenAI will use to improve discount messages
riprova_con_un_prompt_valido_o_invia: Try again with a valid prompt or send /annulla to cancel
openai_user√†_ora_questo_prompt_per_migl: OpenAI will now use this prompt to improve discount messages
invia_il_nuovo_tag_di_affiliazione_per_a: Send the new affiliate tag to update the configuration
invia_il_tag_di_affiliazione_amazon_che_: Send the Amazon affiliate tag that will be added to product links
il_tag_di_affiliazione_deve_essere_almen: The affiliate tag must be at least 3 characters long
riprova_con_un_tag_valido_o_invia_annull: Try again with a valid tag or send /annulla to cancel
tutti_i_link_amazon_nei_messaggi_del_can: All Amazon links in channel messages will now have your affiliate tag
solo_i_god_admin_possono_gestire_altri_a: Only God Admins (defined in .env file) can manage other administrators
usa_il_pulsante_qui_sotto_per_aggiungere: Use the button below to add the first administrator
solo_god_admin_possono_aggiungere_admin: Only God Admins can add admins
invia_l_id_numerico_dell_utente_da_rende: Send the numeric ID of the user to make administrator
l_utente_pu√≤_scrivere_a_userinfobot_e_i: The user can write to @userinfobot and send /start
oppure_usare_rawdatabot_per_ottenere_l_i: Or use @RawDataBot to get the ID
i_regular_admin_potranno_usare_il_bot_ma: Regular Admins will be able to use the bot but will NOT be able to add other administrators
l_id_deve_essere_un_numero_intero: The ID must be an integer number
riprova_con_un_id_valido: Try again with a valid ID
pu√≤_ora_utilizzare_il_bot_ma_non_pu√≤_a: can now use the bot but CANNOT add other administrators
l_utente_non_potr√†_pi√π_utilizzare_il_b: The user will no longer be able to use the bot
non_pu√≤_pi√π_utilizzare_il_bot: can no longer use the bot
i_messaggi_degli_sconti_vengono_automati: Discount messages are automatically approved and sent to groups without manual intervention
i_messaggi_degli_sconti_richiedono_appro: Discount messages require manual approval before being sent to groups
se_configurato_i_messaggi_verranno_comun: If configured, messages will STILL be sent to the database channel but WITHOUT approval button, so you'll always have the complete list for any future reposts
i_messaggi_vengono_inviati_al_canale_dat: Messages are sent to the database channel WITH approval button for manual review
messaggio_approvato_e_inviato_al_gruppo: Message approved and sent to group!
crea_prima_delle_categorie_per_testare_i: Create categories first to test the prompt.
aggiungi_prima_dei_prodotti_a_questa_cat: Add products to this category first.
generazione_dati_di_test_e_chiamata_open: Generating test data and calling OpenAI
testo_attuale_mostrato_nel_messaggio_sot: Current text shown in the message below
inserisci_il_nuovo_testo_per_il_pulsante: Enter the new text for the purchase button
il_testo_del_pulsante_√®_troppo_lungo: The button text is too long
il_testo_del_pulsante_non_pu√≤_essere_vu: The button text cannot be empty
il_nuovo_testo_verr√†_utilizzato_in_tutt: The new text will be used in all discount messages
configura_un_prompt_personalizzato_per_m: Configure a custom prompt to improve discount messages with OpenAI
esempio_prompt: Rewrite this discount message in a more captivating and persuasive way, keeping all technical information.
